All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BeanConfiguration
Configuration class for defining application beans.
CreateErrorResponse
A response class that represents an error response with a message.
CreateTaskRequest
A request class used for creating a new Task.
CreateTaskResponse
A response class that represents the creation of a Task.
DomainTaskEventListener
Listener class for handling task-related events in the domain layer.
DomainTaskService
Implementation of the TaskService interface for managing tasks in the domain layer.
IllegalDateException
An exception that is thrown to indicate that an illegal or invalid date has been encountered.
MainApplication
 
MongoDBTaskManagementAdapter
Adapter class for managing tasks in a MongoDB data source.
Response
A marker interface representing a generic response in the system.
SpringDataMongoTaskRepository
Repository interface for managing Task entities in MongoDB.
Task
A class that represents a task in the system.
TaskController
REST controller for managing tasks.
TaskDueEvent
Event class representing a task that is due.
TaskEvent
An interface representing a task-related event in the system.
TaskRepository
A repository interface for managing Task entities.
TaskSchedulerComponent
Component that schedules the checking of tasks to determine if any are due.
TaskService
An interface representing a service for managing tasks in the system.
TaskStatus
An enumeration representing the various statuses a task can have in the system.
TaskTag
A class representing a tag that can be associated with a task.
WebConfiguration
Configuration class for setting up web-related configurations in the application.
